item.description:
2nd annual downtown Renfest (I've never been to this one)...BYOB Renfest + bring-your-own-meat BBQ, + movie on the green ("Dragonslayer"...fun movie) + "Critical Mass" bicycle celebration

Life-sized Stonehenge, jousting, fire & belly dancers, sword battles, jugglers, giant chess game, LARPing, costume-making workshops, folk music, bands, open mic, centaur rides, a maypole, sidewalk mural competition ($100 prize), & more.

The weather forecast is good (70's), & this is taking place rain or shine.

They've requested "no glass" on the BYOB

Text me when you get there and I'll tell you where the group is. I'm tall (6'3") & I'll be in costume.

Festival goes until 10, movie I think until 11.

COSTUME? I will be in costume (gold & black tabard, white shirt, black belt, black pants, black boots). You don't have to be, many usually aren't. If you try, don't worry about it being good, or authentic, just have fun. There will probably be some wild fantasy-oriented costumes. I've seen people that look like they're basically in BDSM gear, + ninjas, faeries, gypsies, belly dancers, Cindarella, pirates, ogres, Vikings, Mongols, etc.

HOST: Jason, cell 203-901-4957 (texting is fine too; preferred even, since it may be noisy)

PARKING: Street parking is free, and there are lots & garages in the area.
item.how_to_find_us: Text me when you arrive, I'll tell you where group is. I'm tall (6'3") & I'll be in costume
item.name: Thu. 8/26 - Free 1-night Renaissance Fest in Bridgeport!
